headings.usage: Page titles, Card headers, Metric labels

mono.usage: Sensor readings, IDs, Timestamps, Code snippets

typography.installation_guide: Add these fonts via Google Fonts in index.html

usage_rules.dashboard_bg: Use background.default (#09090b) for the main canvas.
usage_rules.gradients: FORBIDDEN. Use solid colors or extremely subtle radial glows for 'active' states only.
usage_rules.text_contrast: Ensure all text on dark backgrounds is at least #a1a1aa or lighter.

sidebar.behavior: Fixed on desktop, drawer on mobile

RiskCard.description: The primary actionable unit. Shows a risk, its probability, and a prescriptive button.
RiskCard.style: Flat card, left colored border indicating severity (Green/Yellow/Red).
RiskCard.interaction: Hover lifts slightly (-translate-y-1) and brightens border.

MetricWidget.description: Single data point with trend indicator.
MetricWidget.style: Minimalist. Big number (JetBrains Mono), small label (Barlow Condensed). Sparkline background optional.

SensorGauge.description: Circular or linear progress bar showing current sensor load.
SensorGauge.style: Technical look. Thin strokes. No rounded caps.

WorkOrderFeed.style: Compact list items. Status badge on right. Monospace ID on left.

visual_enhancements.borders: 1px solid border-white/10 on all cards. No heavy shadows.
visual_enhancements.active_states: Use a 'Glow' effect: box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(234, 88, 12, 0.2) for active elements.
visual_enhancements.textures: Optional subtle 'scanline' overlay (repeating linear gradient) on specific 'Sensor View' sections for immersion.
visual_enhancements.icons: Use Lucide React or Phosphor Icons (Regular weight). Technical and sharp.

images.description: Dark industrial factory interior, cinematic lighting.
Close up of electronic circuit board (green/black).
Industrial safety engineer in hard hat.

libraries.charts: Recharts (Mandatory for performance). Customize generic look to match 'Industrial' theme (hide grid lines, custom dark tooltips).
libraries.maps: React Map GL or simple SVG maps for Sector View. Dark mode styling.
libraries.animations: Framer Motion (for 'Risk Level' transitions and critical alerts).

universal_guidelines: Dark Mode Only: The application is strictly dark mode. Do not implement a light toggle unless absolutely necessary.
Data Density: Maximized. Avoid whitespace for the sake of 'art'. This is a tool for engineers.
Prescriptive UX: Every red/yellow state MUST have an associated 'Action' button nearby.
Typography: Use 'Barlow Condensed' for all headings to save horizontal space and look industrial.
Accessibility: Ensure contrast ratios on the dark background. Use clear icons alongside colors for colorblind safety.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup fonts: Import Barlow Condensed, Inter, and JetBrains Mono.
2. Configure Tailwind: Add the specific colors to tailwind.config.js.
3. Build Layout: Create a DashboardLayout component with a Sidebar and Topbar.
5. Assemble Pages: Construct the Dashboard using the Bento Grid strategy.
6. Apply Interactions: Add simple hover states and the 'Active Prediction' glow effects.
